title.narrative: Conducting a Vietnam country level survey of the Global Corruption Barometer ¿ GCB 2019

description.narrative: Project Goal The goal of the project is to capture over time Vietnam people’s experiences with bribery across different institutions, views of corruption, the effectiveness of the government’s anticorruption efforts, as well as citizens’ willingness to stand up against corruption. Specific Objectives The main objective of the project is to collect and provide detailed evidence on how corruption is perceived and experienced in Vietnam. Specifically, GCB 2019 aims at providing recommendations to specific targets groups such as the Communist Party of Vietnam, the government anti-corruptions agencies and other stakeholders on how to eliminate bribery in public services, engage citizens in anti-corruption efforts and address corruption in the private sector. Expected results: 1. A comprehensive mapping of Vietnamese people perceptions, experience and behaviours associated with integrity and corruption in the form of a Global Corruption Barometer publication (GCB 2019), in both English and Vietnamese languages. 2. The results of the GCB 2019 will be used to promote and support greater integrity amongst citizens in Vietnam. 3. The GCB 2019 report will contribute to policy advocacy by providing clear recommendations to anti-corruption agencies, government education (and other public) institutions with a view to improving their anti-corruption programmes.
